div.p: John MacPerson, Government of Madras to Chief Secretary of Victoria
K76/3574, unit 873, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

To proof.
Schedule of Transfers submitted by the Chief Secretary to the Governor in Council for Approval on the tenth day of April 1876
